```{r}

library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| include: false
dane=read_excel("p_2024.xlsx",sheet="p_2024")
dane$Uczelnia <- factor(dane$Uczelnia, levels = dane$Uczelnia[order(-dane$Ranking_2024)])

d1=dane %>% 
  filter(ind=="UE")

dane2=dane[c(1:36,46,48,70),]
nazwy=names(d1)
```


```{r}
#| title: Wykres
#| fig-height: 30
#| fig-width: 30

ggplot(dane2, aes(x = Uczelnia, y = Ranking_2024, fill = kolor)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  labs(x="",y="Ranking_2024")+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1,size=30),axis.text.y = element_text(size = 20))+
    scale_fill_identity()

```
